2. Colorful and Cozy Graphics:


Delight in a visual feast as charming, colorful graphics bring the holiday spirit to life. The cozy ambiance creates the perfect backdrop for your culinary escapades and ghostly encounters.

3. Cooking Delicious Cookies:


Dive into the heart of the game by crafting delicious Christmas cookies. Feel the joy of mixing, baking, and decorating your culinary creations, each step bringing you closer to transforming Brownie's house into a festive masterpiece.

4. Earn Coins for Decorations:


Every delectable cookie brings you one step closer to transforming Brownie's once-barren abode. Earn coins through your culinary efforts, and use them to unlock a variety of decorations, upgrades, and ingredients from the in-game shop.

5. Shop for Ingredients and Upgrades:


Explore the charming shop owned by a friendly gnome, your go-to destination for essential ingredients, helpful upgrades, and delightful decorations. Choose wisely to enhance your cooking skills and create a warm and inviting Christmas home.

6. Transform Brownie's Haunted House:


Witness the magical evolution of Brownie's haunted house as you infuse it with the holiday spirit. From a stark and empty dwelling, watch it blossom into a cozy Christmas haven that mirrors the warmth of your culinary achievements.
Indulge in the perfect blend of holiday cheer and ghostly charm as you create lasting memories in 'Brownie's Haunted Christmas.' Are you ready to cook and turn a spooky tale into a heartwarming holiday adventure?

item.title: BladeBound
item.description:
About This Game



In the once-peaceful realm of men, darkness descends. Heroes have fallen, yet the battle rages on. You are the Bladebound, the final hope of a vanquished order. Resurrected by the Sentinel, a mighty goddess, you are destined to restore peace in a world consumed by war. Arm yourself for an epic journey to reclaim the glory of your fallen brethren.




Traverse through dense forests, icy caverns, forgotten mines, and ancient ruins. Each environment is teeming with secrets and dangers.




Challenge a myriad of enemies - beasts, demons, goblins, and more. Utilize powerful spells and skills to conquer formidable bosses like The Brutal Impaler and The King of Blizzard.




Loot, craft, and upgrade diverse weapons and armor. Fuse equipment with mystical ingredients to create artifacts like The Sword of Eternal Flames.




Rise through the ranks in the champions' contest. Show your might in the PVP Arena and claim your place among the elite.




Join daily and weekly events for unique rewards. Test your skills in Monster Hunts and other thrilling challenges.




Select your emblem and wield the forces of nature. Harness fire, water, and more to unleash deadly skills.




Embark on an action-packed journey. Enjoy the rush of combat, the joy of crafting, and the thrill of victory in this RPG legend.




Dive into a riveting story. Align with your Sentinel, challenge various difficulty levels, and immerse yourself in classic isometric gameplay.





Ongoing Adventures Await Engage in six captivating chapters, with the seventh on the horizon. New challenges, stories, and battles continue to unfold.
💎 Stay Connected & Join the Order 💎
Visit our website and dive into the world of Bladebound - a free-to-play, legendary RPG experience. Your legacy begins now.

item.title: InVertia
item.description:
About This Game

Escape through the various test rooms of the Institute, a misterious lab that you find yourself in after waking up from a coma and with a new found superpower - gravity manipulation.

item.title: Dice of God
item.description:
About This Game

Dice of God a short, turn-based adventure game with dice-rolling.

The fox warrior, bestowed with the Dice of God, is about to face unknown dangers. Let the battle begin with a roll of the dice.

Features

- Engage in battle using dice, whether for attacking or defending. The number rolled on the dice will determine your attack or defense values.
- Choose a unique artifact as loot to gain a special upgrade.
- Craft your own dice. Cut out paper dice from cards filled with numbers based on specific shapes, turning them into your makeshift weapons.

item.title: Animalistic Worlds
item.description:
About This Game

Animalistic Worlds is an Open-World RPG that takes place in a world where anthropomorphic animals try to live like humans used to in modern society, but often fail miserably due to their animal instincts.

All of this being visible from the lens of one such victim of this world: Hounderick.
A samoyed dog living a pretty dull life of an office worker with an even duller lifestyle of beating up delinquents, stealing their money, harassing shopkeepers for discounts and insulting his neighbors. This changes when he finds out the co-worker he was ignoring for some time, Beardford the bearded dragon, was a CEO's son. The attempts of getting in contact with this CEO cause a kidnapping to happen that drags both Hounderick and Beardford into a pretty dangerous place, one that Hounderick knows tragically well.

This game features:


  • Giant cities to search through trash, random wooden boxes lying around, or maybe a stranger's house, to find useful things to mercilessly beat up your enemies in turn-based combat.

  • An optional bug catching minigame to get even more items that make your enemies beg at your feet.

  • Unique NPCs complaining about things at daytime and nighttime.

  • Bribing shopkeepers for discounts

  • Threatening delinquents.

  • Completing quests that are mostly from animals that have no friends.

  • An achievement for sitting on a chair.

  • Talking fish.

item.title: Mortal Glory 2 Prologue
item.description:
About This Game

Mortal Glory 2 Prologue gives a quick glimpse into what the full game contains.




Roll an explosive barrel at your enemy, throw them into a pit or take out two enemies by knocking them into each other. With a wide variety of tools available to you, your creativity will determine how you deal with the competition. Unique arenas, randomized environments and occasional special rules ensure that each fight offers new tactical opportunities.





A wide variety of fantasy races are seeking glory, each with their own unique racial strengths. Whatever your tactics are, finding the best recruits is essential!





There is a vast collection of unique relics, character perks and more to discover. Finding clever combos and deadly synergies will unlock new strategies and occasionally turn your gladiators into unfairly strong demons.





Various difficulty settings will accommodate your preferred playstyle and there are increasingly harder challenges to master. But beware... The AI is brutally talented at the highest levels.





With every step comes a new challenge or perhaps... an opportunity? It is up to you to guide where your team should travel next... and suffer the consequences.





Each playthrough is different! With various tactics to try and additional increasingly harder challenges to master, the arena will keep welcoming you back again and again. Thanks to conveniently paced combat, Mortal Glory 2 is also great to play if you only have a moment to spare.

item.title: TTA 1
item.description:
About This Game

TTA 1 is a tower defense game with elements of a puzzle game.
You have to beat waves of enemies to defend a map.

The twist between this and normal tower defense games is that enemies in this games have special abilities which make it necessary to find a way how to beat them. In most maps you cannot simply build a defense line with towers, you also need to analyse the enemies and find a way how you can beat them. Use 4 different towers and their special attack way, aiming with the mouse and mouse gestures to defend the maps against the enemies.

The game is easy to learn but hard to beat.


Features:
- 20 levels + 3 Bosses
- Monster Power Levels
- Easter Egg
- Around 30 different enemies, half of them with special abilities to defend theirselfs.
- Minimalistic design
- 3 Difficulties
- Steam Achievements
- 4 different towers, each comes with 3 upgrade tiers
- 1 Special Tower only in Boss level
- Cloudsave

item.title: Absence of Light
item.description:
About This Game

Solve, shoot, and shine your way though the kingdom of Luminara! Light has scattered across the kingdom, leaving darkness and apathy in between. It's up to you to restore the four pillars of light and reawaken the Gate of Truth.

Inspired by bullet-hell style arcade games, but with a more open ended level design, Absence of Light combines puzzling level design with high precision action for a more expansive yet accessible take on the shoot 'em up genre.

item.title: Adrian's Tale
item.description:
About This Game

Adrian's Tale is an action-adventure game where you control a little Hero.
You have to improve your skills in order to move further through the plot, solve puzzles, fight enemies using your sword, as well as additional weapons that you can select in your inventory.

One day most of the animals disappeared and Hero has to find out what happened the night when animals have disappeared and bring them back. For this purpose the Hero has to travel a lot, search for various items and weapons as well as solve puzzles, fight against enemies and bosses.

item.title: Replik Survivors
item.description:
About This Game


Click on the image above to join the Discord server.


「Replik Survivors」 is a time survival game with role-playing and roguelite elements.
Become a replik(clone girl) to defeat the Lab's enemies.


In this game, You can use the enhancement system to freely construct various attack triggers, arrange the order, and make your own skill set.
In addition, there are several different characters waiting for you to find out.
・A wide selection of attack styles and enhanced attributes.
・7 kinds of characters with completely different playstyles.
・5 levels of difficulty, different enemies, different bosses.

item.title: Ace Triad
item.description:
About This Game

This is a card game where you use your strategies to beat different opponents with different battle styles. These battles take place in the world of Green, where the player develops not only their skills, but also their deck, which is increasingly prepared for new challenges in this casual strategy adventure.

item.title: Rotten Flesh - Cosmic Horror Survival Game
item.description:
About This Game



This is an immersive horror game where you have to find your dog by shouting for "ROY" on your microphone. Microphone input is totally optionally and can be turned off which will switch to voice-acting instead for calling, but microphone input is highly recommended for the full experience.

Rotten Flesh is a cosmic horror survival game where you have just lost your dog named Roy and you have to find him by shouting for "ROY" on your microphone. Venture deep into the sewers where your dog was lost - however, something else can also hear your screams in the tunnels... and they are not human.







TRIGGER WARNING: This game may be disturbing to some audience as it contains cosmic horror, fear, jumpscares, loud sounds and the enemy can also hear your voice from your microphone input.

You as the loving owner that you are have to find your dog by shouting for "ROY" on your microphone. If your dog is near, Roy will bark back to you - however something else can also hear your screams .. and it's not Roy. Go into a terrifying journey to find a man's best friend in this PSX-Style horror game. Solve puzzles, find weapons to survive and fight your way through to get back your beloved dog Roy, only if you dare. That's what good owners do.

Features:

  • Weapon system: Find weapons to protect yourself and fight your way to hope for your dog.
  • Microphone Input: shout for 'ROY' on your microphone to call for your dog, if he is close Roy will bark back. However, your dog is not the only one down these tunnels.
  • Terrifying story: Venture the terrifying and disturbing sewers and tunnels that was supposedly occupied by a leading cult. Discover secrets and find your dog, Roy.
  • PSX Gameplay: PSX style graphics combined with cosmic horror that will leave players with hair up their skin.
  • Puzzle Solving: Find clues, solve puzzles and try to advance to the next objectives.
  • Survival elements with full inventory system, objectives, clue-findings and tools to help you in escaping.
  • Puzzles to unsolve, mysteries to uncover. Use your mind to overcome obstacles that you will find in your way.
  • Stealth System: Try and sneak through the terrifying enemies that can only be seen by scanning them.
  • Hiding System: Hide from the enemies under tables, while trying to stay quiet as they can hear you from your microphone when you are in hiding mode.
  • Gut Wrecking Moments: Walking on broken glass can make noises that the enemy may hear, same as moving crates or knocking over objects. all these things can give away your position. Try to evade them or use them as your advantages.
  • Inventory Management: Find supplies, upgrades, health packs and more items will be vital for your survival.

Use your microphone to call for 'Roy'. If your dog is near, he will bark back to you.

Search the sewers and tunnels for your lost dog, as any loving owner should do.

Find guns, ammo and weapons to protect yourself against the bigger threats.

Manage your inventory, find supplies and combine them to help you in the journey.

Gut-wrecking moments with an enemy that can hear you and your voice.

Protect yourself not only from enemies, but also from infected rats that will hurt you.

Hide in lockers, under tables and in furniture to stay hidden from the enemy.

Creepy environment with narrow and claustrophobic corridors and rooms.

Use items, objects and flesh to your advantage to distract the enemy.



Rotten Flesh is a horror survival game made by one developer at Steelkrill Studio. This is objective-finding game with puzzles to solve, and terrifying encounters, inventory system, stamina, pistols, shooting mechanics, microphone input and a lot more features. If you can, please submit your feedback and report any bugs and this will really help speed up the progress of the development! Thank you so much.

item.title: You Can Save Everyone
item.description:
About This Game



Designed for Levered Arcade Sticks and Controllers.

FEATURES

  • Experimental gameplay designed specifically for levered arcade sticks and controllers, use their unique features to solve kinematic puzzles
  • Communicate with the others trapped inside the facility using the computers chat function
  • Gather clues to help you gain greater control of the console
  • Examine your surroundings to find passwords that will unlock the secrets of the facility
  • A short but story-packed experience intended to be finished in roughly an hour.
  • Featuring an original soundtrack by Razeacc



Trapped deep within a mysterious facility, your connection is limited to that device in your hands. You must use it to interact with your surroundings, operating a computer alongside a strange console that controls the locks in the entire facility. You must help the people trapped inside to escape, but be careful. The locks aren't there just for you.

Your only objective?
Save Everyone.

That doesn't sound so hard, right?

If you're going to succeed, you'll need to pay close attention to what your allies within the facility say. As you are trapped within a single room, they are your only change at gaining clues in other parts of the facility, clues that will help you to solve the inner workings of the console and help save everyone.

Just this once, everybody lives. But only if you can work together with everyone to solve the puzzles and uncover the secrets of the facility. Fight for everyone's happy ending.

_____________________________________________________________________

Keyboard functionality is included but not guaranteed to work due to hardware differences in keyboards. If you cannot hold down the keys UIOPJKL; all at once, keyboard will not work.

WARNING: Contains themes of Anxiety, Depression, and Suicide

item.title: Peepo Hop!
item.description:
About This Game

Peepo Hop! is a precision platformer that will test your challenge your skills. Play as Peepo to reclaim his treasure perched at the top but be careful one wrong hop can send Peepo falling back down.



Master the Art of Precision: Take control of the unique jumping mechanic, where you charge Peepo's left and right leg independently. Combine the strength of each leg to change the trajectory of your jump.



Race to the Top: Finish your ascent and your time will be recorded on the leaderboard. Contribute your time to a group on the leaderboard where the average time of your group is ranked amongst other groups.



Peepo needs your help to reclaim his treasure. Mind your hops and aim for the top. Try not to fall too many times. Good luck!

item.title: 3D PUZZLE - Factory
item.description:
About This Game

Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

The player can carry items by taking them with the left mouse button and automatically place them if he brought them
to the right place. Move the player on the WASD keys

You need to go to the item, take it by pressing the left mouse button and take the item to the desired location marked in green. If you brought the correct item, it will snap into place and you will receive leaderboard points and achievements for this.

Collect as much substance as possible as quickly as possible to get more points for the leaderboard.

If you brought the wrong item, you can throw it away, it will return to the starting location so that you can pick it up again.

item.title: Out Of Mind
item.description:
About This Game

Out Of Mind is an immersive psychological thriller and puzzle game. In this adventure set in a dark mental hospital, journalist Ethan, players will navigate the mazes of their minds and confront their own fears. Evade, solve, and keep secrets, but most importantly, pursue the mysteries within your own psyche!

Atmospheric Design:


Out Of Mind offers players an unforgettable experience with its deep atmosphere and meticulously crafted graphics. Navigating labyrinthine corridors, players embark on a journey through the mysterious world of Abyssal Hospital, filled with dark secrets.

Puzzle Solving:


In Out Of Mind, where each game is unique and filled with complex puzzles, players engage in mental unraveling. The game challenges them to solve a suspenseful story and bravely confront their own fears.

Unique Story and Environments:


Out Of Mind provides an experience that makes each gaming session unique, inviting players to get lost in the mazes of their own fears. A completely new world filled with mysterious rooms, challenging puzzles, and encountered terrifying entities promises surprises at every step.

Get Lost in Your Mental Maze:


Out Of Mind offers players the chance to experience a gripping psychological thriller within the confines of a dark mental hospital. A challenge for enthusiasts of suspense and puzzles, get lost in the dark world by pursuing the secrets of your own mind!

item.title: The Street 10
item.description:
About This Game

Caught in an infinite alley, look for Street 10 to find your way out.

You find yourself on "Street 10," a mysterious segment of Tokyo's urban streets.
Your mission: observe every detail around you.
If something unusual catches your attention, be alert and change your path.

Your Goal: to Find An Exit On Street 10.

"The Street 10" is a walking simulator set against the backdrop of Tokyo's street landscape, where the mundane intertwines with the unusual. Noticing oddities is your key to uncovering the elusive Exit 10.

Leaderboards track those who have skillfully navigated the complexities of Tokyo's streets, adding a competitive edge.

Play Time

10-90 minutes

Clarification

When you play this game, you feel a liminal terror, everything happens late at night, with only the sounds of crickets audible. There are no screamers in this game, but sometimes the street frightens with its unpredictability. If you're a city dweller, you might have noticed strange and anomalous things happening in real life, feeling like you're the only one noticing them. Experience the fear of the unknown and the abnormal. But try to break out of this loop.

Walkthrough

Pay attention to the numbers on the traffic light; they will show you how far you've progressed in the game.

Options

  • Control camera movement and sensitivity
  • V-Sync
  • Leaderboard showing players who have found the most anomalies

item.title: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 6 - Collector's Edition
item.description:
About This Game

AVIs new game "Trip to Europe 6" offers an exciting Christmas journey through the snowy European countries. Playing the game you will be able to find hidden objects in historical places in Europe and Scandinavia, play exciting mini-games and collect souvenirs.

AviGames presents the sixth game in the series of games "Big Adventure: Trip to Europe". The new part contains new exciting ways to find objects and a lot of new interesting mini-games.

This exciting trip will allow you to visit 30 beautiful places and tourist attractions. This fabulous trip will allow you to visit 30 new places all over Europe.
Take a walk around Christmas market in Berlin, visit Santa Claus in Finland, walk across Charles Bridge in Prague and explore many snowy Christmas locations. Take a ride on an ice rink and travel by train, ship and plane.

In this hidden object game you will be able to visit many both new and popular tourist places. To complete this game, you need to apply your skills and attention to cope with the mini-games and find all the hidden objects.


The collector 's edition includes:
- 8 additional locations - continue your journey across Europe and search for our raccoon friend!
- 8 additional new mini-games + 12 more for puzzle lovers
- Colorful desktop wallpapers
- Music player
- Album with exclusive postage stamps
- 20 Christmas souvenirs from the trip
- Achievements page

item.title: Project Jeff
item.description:
About This Game

A strange and difficult roguelite game by Jeff, formerly an NPC.

Grab your equipment, there are monsters to kill in the deep and narrow dungeons.

Features


  • 16 Enemy types
  • 18 Weapons
  • 9 Dungeons
  • Bombs, potions and more.

item.title: Yi Xian: The Cultivation Card Game
item.description:
About This Game

Cards Building

  • You will draw a lot of cards on the path of cultivation.
  • You need to choose the appropriate cards from them and build your deck.
  • Exert biggest power of your cards by combining and collocating them.

Sub-Profession

  • In each game, you can choose a Sub-Profession.
  • Each Sub-Profession has a set of exclusive cards.
  • The same character can build different deck by matching different Sub-Profession, and obtain different game experiences.
  • The mechanism of Character plus Sub-Profession can greatly increases the playability.

Destiny

  • Destiny is the gift of fate that the character receives on the path of cultivation.
  • Every time you break through, multiple Destiny options will appear randomly according to the sect and character you choose. You need to choose your Destiny.
  • The effects of Destiny are various, including card drawing, attribute increasing, and various passive effects, etc. Some Destines even require you to build a deck according to their effects.

Opportunities

  • On the path to cultivation, opportunities are also a part of strength. After each battle, there is a very small chance to encounter an Opportunity card.
  • Through Opportunity cards, you can get Spiritual Pet cards, Talisman cards and Guild Secret Spell cards.
  • These cards are very rare, and their strength may be similar to the regular cards of the same rank, but they often bring you new building ideas and help you create unique and rare decks.

Battle with Other Players

  • Each of your opponents are other players online, and everyone builds a deck from scratch.
  • Every battle with your opponent will test your deck’s strength, and you will be eliminated if you lose multiple battles.

Devise strategies, climb to the top of cultivation, and wait for you to battle!

item.title: My IShowSpeed
item.description:
About This Game

MY IShowSpeed is a game about a popular blogger who gained over 20 million subscribers on YouTube. In honor of that, this game was made.
Here you can go all the way from scratch, pump your muscles, become a professional soccer player, earn a fortune, and much more!
You and your Speedy will never get bored, because there are tons of mini-games and fun activities in the game!

Location: Speedy house, Ohio

Game includes:
    [Youtuber Simulator]
    [Streamer Simulator]
    [10 mini games]
    [4 rooms]
    [Customization of home]
    [Customization of furniture in each room]
    [Customization of your character]
    [Buying computer peripherals]
    [leveling up your character]
    [Ohio Sign]
    [Snow]

And him:

item.title: SoulBound
item.description:
About This Game

SoulBound is a 2D platformer where one player control’s a ninja whose goal is to traverse through a randomly generated level whilst the other player controls a ghost who can possess and control the enemies throughout the level in order to try and defeat the ninja. Once the ninja is defeated the player’s roles are swapped and whoever travels the furthest as the ninja wins. The chaotic gameplay of this multiplayer platformer along with the fun provided from controlling and fighting player controlled enemies leads to a lot replay ability and fun assisted by the pixel art aesthetic of the game.

A game by Schmoovin Studios
Peter Cheshire
Harrison Clarke
Samuel Myatt
Paul Haynes
Kacper Nowak

Music by Jakealtmann

Cover art by Notperera

item.title: J and the Sewer World
item.description:
About This Game

J and the Sewer World is a 2D platforming game with a pixel art style inspired by classic games from the 80's and 90's. Developed in Game Maker Studio 2 for the first time, the game incorporates nostalgic elements of the video game era.

The story follows J, a boy who, while playing soccer with his friends at the neighborhood field, accidentally kicks the ball into the sewer's manhole. His friends, annoyed with the loss of the ball, push J into taking responsibility and retrieve it. Upon entering the sewer, J discovers that the ball is not where he imagined, thus initiating his journey to find it. While exploring the sewer filled with creatures like Slimes, Flies, Toe-Biters, and Catfishes, he encounters several hardships.

Across 4 distinct stages inside the sewer, filled with enemies and bosses, J interacts with several NPCs who call the sewer home, some of whom give valuable tips to overcome the challenges.

GAMEPLAY:
In the game, the player assumes control of J, making use of simple commands, like moving right and left, jumping, and attacking with the slingshot, which fires rocks. The challenge lies in exploring the area, fighting enemies and bosses while interacting with the residents of the sewer on the quest for the precious soccer ball.

item.title: Spacetron
item.description:
About This Game

In Spacetron, you are an extraterrestrial who finds itself stranded and fighting to survive in an unknown solar system against a hostile life form.

Utilize your superior alien technology to annihilate them:

-Incinerate your enemies with your laser
-Abduct the hostile life forms with your tractor beam
-Wreak havoc with your plasma blasts
-Obliterate them with your detonation pulse

Spacetron features quality stereo sound and music, high-resolution graphics, few system requirements, and a simple keyboard+mouse user-interface.

item.title: NINJA KATO 2
item.description:
About This Game

【Second in the Ninja Kato series!】
A side-scrolling 2D action game.
After completing his training in "NINJA KATO 1," the robot ninja Kato takes on the next challenge.

This time, the task given to Kato by his master is to avoid the approaching cannonballs and use items
to reach the top floor where his master is waiting as quickly as possible.
Kato will be evaluated by his master based on the time he clears!
Reach the master as quickly as possible and earn a high reputation!

After clearing all stages, Kato will take on an even more difficult stage.
When all training is completed, Kato will make new history!
